snippet: Speaker Christine C. Quinn of the City Council, a leading contender in the Democratic mayoral primary in 2013, gave her State of the City speech.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn gives her annual State of the City speech, simultaneously offering an agenda for the City Council and a preview of her mayoral campaign; Quinn, considered a leading contender in the Democratic mayoral primary in 2013, focused on concerns common to poor and middle-class New Yorkers.

byline.original: By KATE TAYLOR and DAVID W. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Speaker Christine C. Quinn of the City Council, a leading contender in the Democratic mayoral primary in 2013, gave her State of the City speech.

headline.seo: Speaker Quinn Gives State of the City Address
headline.main: Council Speaker Previews Bid for Mayor in Address
headline.print_headline: Quinn Previews Mayoral Campaign in Council Speech
